OOC: I'm not sure what the last post you got was, but from what you
responded, it seems you got it right.

BIC:

Beachcomber smiled, satisfied at what he has found. "There is a large
Mountain chain in Ethiopia, we could go there." he suggested.
Cliffjumper didn't seem to care.

"Well, what do you guys think?"
